title: Teemo skin idea
body:
So I thought of a mad skin idea for Teemo, I sort of want them to make it (so I know that I was the idea inspiration person) but I also sort of don't (cause it's Teemo and he has so many skins)

Now the skin name is TeAmo or Te Amo or Teamo, it basically means "I love you" in Spanish and a Teemo would look mad for valentines day with that skin.

Abilties:
Q: Shoots out love hearts or something cute
W: Leaves a trail of love hearts when he sprints
E: instead of poison... you guessed it hearts, cause he made em love sick get it?
R: Places down a box of chocolates in a love heart shape

I have a feeling some other LoL player has thought of this so chuck me the link if you've seen it and ill delete this cheers

replies.body: Counter Skin Idea: Teemcer - A Teemo skin that resembles cancer cells and matching abilities visuals.
Nice concept, but teamo just sounds a bit silly despite its Spanish meaning, this is OCE after all not a Spanish server. Heart seeker teemo or something like that sounds more appropriate.
Nice skin idea, but maybe for another champ seeing as teemo has 8 skins
